title: linsay
author: linsay
content: I am selling my COOL BURN mechanical keyboardI bought it about half a year ago, it is a full size keyboard and comes with a hand rest, it has wireless and wired 3-way connections, since I only play with it every weekend LOL, so it is very new, box and product manual It's still there, I bought it for $39 and it's on sale for $28, but you'll need to pay for shipping and any other charges you may incurHere are the details of my purchase of this product, you can take a look and decide if you need itï¼šhttps://cool-burn.com/product/bluetooth-wireless-usb-wired-rechargeable-tri-mode-rgb-gamer-gaming-mechanical-keyboard-with-palm-rest/
